page.description: Searches for occurrences of a sub-string starting with 'start_string' and ending with 'end_string' and replaces with 'replace_string'. Replace_count specifies how many replacements to make. Default is 0, which indicates replace all occurrences. Search is case-sensitive.
page.syntax: Modified_String as C = strtran_special(C string ,C Start_string ,C End_string ,C replace_string [,N replace_count ])

argument.name: Modified_String
argument.description: The modified version of Search_in_Text if replacements were made. Otherwise, the unmodified Search_in_Text.

argument.name: string
argument.description: The text to search for occurrences of the find text.

argument.name: Start_string
argument.description: The beginning characters of a find text of variable length.

argument.name: End_string
argument.description: The ending characters of a find text of variable length.

argument.name: replace_string
argument.description: The text that replaces the find text.

argument.name: replace_count
argument.description: Optional. Default = 0 (all occurrences). The number of occurrences to replace. Numeric

page.discussion: The STRITRAN_SPECIAL() function replaces occurrences of a variable length find text, specified with a starting character string and an ending character string.
page.limitations: The Start_string and End_string arguments are case sensitive.
